data.title: Brandon Park - Men's Tennis
data.meta_description:
Brandon Park - 2023-24 (Senior)
• Received All-Big West honorable mention distinction in doubles
• Finished the season with 14 overall doubles wins including 10
data.text:
2023-24 Men's Tennis Roster

Choose a Player:

Brandon Park

Height 5-10

Class Senior

Hometown Bakersfield, Calif.

Prev School Pacific

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023-24 (Senior)

• Received All-Big West honorable mention distinction in doubles

• Finished the season with 14 overall doubles wins including 10 in dual matches

• Teamed up with Matthew Sah for eight victories at No. 3

• Defeated Conrad Brown/Luka Mrsic of 45th-ranked UC Santa Barbara, 6-2, in the Big West championship match

• Also earned Big West wins against UC Davis, UC Riverside and UCSB during the regular season

• Joined forces with Noah Zamora to advance to the doubles Round of 16 at the ITA Southwest Regional Championships in the fall

• Competed in singles at the ITA All-American Championships

2022-23 (Junior)

• Earned first-team All-Big West honors in doubles and was a second-team selection in singles

• Teamed up with Noah Zamora to go 12-4 at No. 1 doubles

• Won their first six matches as a duo and went 4-1 against conference opponents

• Defeated UC Davis’ Mitchell Davis/Andrei Volgin, 7-6 (2) to secure the doubles point in a Big West semifinal win

• Closed out the season with a 16-7 overall and 10-5 (4-1 Big West) dual-match record in singles

• Played at No. 2 (7-2) and No. 3 (3-3)

• Put together a six-match win streak from March 16-April 8; Did not drop a set during that stretch

• Helped the ‘Eaters clinch a share of the Big West title with a 7-6 (7), 6-2 victory over UC San Diego’s Phillip Lan in the regular-season finale

• Also took down conference opponents from UC Riverside, Hawai’i and Cal Poly

• Upended Constantinos Koshis and Nicola Cigna of Arizona State at the ITA Southwest Regional during the fall season

2021-22 (Sophomore at Pacific)

• Went 7-3 in dual-match singles, including a 3-1 mark in West Coast Conference play

• Delivered his first clinching point at the collegiate level with a 6-4, 6-4 win over Ryan Morgan of UC Davis

• Earned a straight-set victory against Emin Torlic of LMU to help the Tigers to their first WCC win of the season

• Also defeated Dominik Jakovljevic, 6-1, 6-4, at the third position to lead UOP to a sweep of BYU

• Finished with a 3-2 doubles record alongside partner Ran Amar

2020-21 (at Pacific)

• Team opted out of the season

2019-20 (Freshman at Gonzaga)

• Posted a 9-4 overall singles record (2-1 dual) before the season was cut short in response to the COVID-19 pandemic

• Earned victories in his first three collegiate matches at the EWU Fall Classic

• Also went 6-2 in doubles

• Teamed up with Vincent Rettke to top Pacific’s Coby McCaig/John Horoz Garner in the Round of 64 at the ITA Northwest Regional

• Earned the ITA Community Service Team Award

High School

• Four-star recruit with a national ranking of 120

• Three-time team MVP at Stockdale High School

• Earned first-team All-Area honors as a freshman and junior

• CIF Central Section finalist

• Helped the Mustangs to three consecutive Southwest Yosemite League titles (2016-18)

Personal

• Majoring in international studies

CAREER RECORDS AT UCI

Overall Singles: 18-11

Dual-Match Singles: 11-6

Overall Doubles: 28-19

Dual-Match Doubles: 22-14
